member.name: IMFTimedTextBinary.GetData
member.summary: Gets the data content of the timed-text object.
member.param: A pointer to a memory block that receives a pointer to the data content of the timed-text object.
A pointer to a variable that receives the length in bytes of the data content.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFTimedTextBinary
member.summary: Represents the data content of a timed-text object.
